report.title: UKBMS Timed Count Download Report
report.description: Lists saved data for the Timed Counts.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE parent.survey_id=#survey_id# AND parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR parent.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR parent.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: parent.id as sample_id, s.id as sub_sample_id, o.id as occurrence_id, parent.location_name as location_name, parent.entered_sref as entered_sref, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include
